names: Labral tear including superior labral anterior-posterior (SLAP) tears (Evidence: pg no: 16, L541)
description: Labrum repair is considered medically necessary when ALL of the following criteria are met. (Evidence: pg no: 16, L542)
scope: This guideline addresses shoulder arthroscopy and open procedures when performed as an elective, non-emergent procedure and not as part of the care of an acute fracture. (Evidence: pg no: 12, L373-L374)
